summary: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, an invitational martial arts contest. There, four female rival fighters will have to work together to uncover the secret that the organizer of the tournament is trying to hide.
cast: Jaime Pressly|Devon Aoki|Holly Valance|Sarah Carter|Natassia Malthe|Kane Kosugi|Matthew Marsden|Eric Roberts|Steve Howey|Brian White|Kevin Nash|Collin Chou|Derek Boyer|Silvio Simac|Fang Liu|Ying Wang|Chad McCord|Martin Crewes|Theodore Thomas|Li Shi|Anna Bolt|Hung Lin|Song Lin|Robin Shou
keywords: based on video game|bare midriff|legs crossed|gagged|leg
title: DOA: Dead or Alive
